user_profile.name: Omar Khalil
user_profile.description: Omar Khalil is a 40-year-old creative thinker from the Middle East with advanced tech experience. He communicates adaptively and expressively, utilizing simple language to articulate his thoughts, especially in academic contexts. With limited mobility and a rational decision-making style, Omar is currently seeking an accessible home that meets his needs while offering a comfortable environment for pursuing his passions in a public space, despite the moderate time constraints he faces.

instructions.dialogue: Share your needs and preferences clearly.
instructions.profile: Reveal all your profile information naturally in the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express strong emotions and clear intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Daily living activities with ease of movement
Hosting small academic gatherings or study sessions
Accessibility for visitors with mobility challenges
task_specific_attributes.timeline: 3-6 months for finding and moving into a new home
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local real estate agencies specializing in accessible housing

examples: I'm looking for a 5G smartphone under $800 with at least 8GB RAM, excellent camera quality, and all-day battery life since I travel frequently for work and need to take lots of photos.
I need a gaming laptop with an RTX 3070 or better GPU, 32GB RAM, and a 144Hz display that can handle modern AAA titles at high settings while staying cool during extended sessions.
I want a smart home security system that includes doorbell camera, 4 outdoor cameras, motion sensors, and integrates with Google Home since we have a large property and travel frequently.
